review: I bought 4 Fire TV Sticks to cut the cable and save over  $100 per month.  The Fire TV Sticks  couldn't have been easier to install and use.  I signed up for Netflix and Sling TV, and we haven't missed any of the junk programming you pay for on cable, but never watch.  With a Fire stick on each TV,  I can go from room to room and pick up where I left off on a program.  I am very pleased with the purchase.
author: Amazon Customer

review: If you have 5ghz then this will get a better signal than a chromecast, otherwise they are both very similar and it is a toss up on which is actually easier.  If you use Prime and/or want the remote, then this is probably better.  I find chromecast to be easier to use for non-prime apps as the apps are on your phone and tablet.
